title: I just bought a gaming mouse endorsed by WildTurtle
body:
On the back of the package, I noticed it specified MOBAs... then I see his tiny little face and a quote endorsing the mouse I had picked up.

Am I gonna be super pro faceroll ftw ftw dunksquad noscope 420 blaze it gais!?!

I am a little disappointed, but I totally would do the same for the money he probably got...
